content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the fraction with numerator 2 times x squared minus 1, and denominator 5 x plus 3, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of negative 1, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
